collision
Interface ICollisionMgr

All Known Implementing Classes:
CollisionMgr
public interface ICollisionMgr

ICollisionMgr implementations detect and signal a collision between two items.

Version:
0.6
Author:
Daffy Duck

Method Summary
abstract  void addCollidable(ICollidable collidable)
          Subscribe a collidable.
abstract  void removeCollidable(ICollidable collidable)
          Unsubscribe a collidable.
abstract  void update()
          Update the the manager.
 

Method Detail

addCollidable

void addCollidable(ICollidable collidable)
Subscribe a collidable. The collidable is any item that can collide within the world.

Parameters:
collidable - a world object of type ICollidable - the collidable

removeCollidable

void removeCollidable(ICollidable collidable)
Unsubscribe a collidable. The collidable is any item that can collide within the world.

Parameters:
collidable - a world object of type ICollidable - the collidable

update

void update()
Update the the manager.
